Search basics

Derpibooru\'s search engine is based on the tags associated with the uploaded images. A search for pinkie pie, for example, yields the entries featuring Pinkie Pie.

Separate multiple tags with a comma or &&. The queries are not case sensitive â€” the capitalization does not matter.

You can mark the tags you do not want to appear with either ! or -:
!fluttershy or -fluttershy matches pictures that do not feature Fluttershy.

To request uploads that meet only a part of the criteria, use the disjunction (OR expression) specified with ||, and separate the subexpressions with parentheses.

Consider the following example: (twilight sparkle || fluttershy) && pinkie pie returns results that have either Twilight Sparkle or Fluttershy, and always Pinkie Pie.
